attributes.action: Publish a list of all existing quangos, the total cost of these, what are their respective remits, what benefits are obtained which the vaious Government Departments cannot achieve without the quangos, and how can the cost effectiveness be established.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the public were kept informed as to the number of quangos in existence, and what their specific remits are, the benefits, if any, could be established.  From a cursory examination it would appear that they comprise Jobs for the BOYS/Girls, and it would help the electorate to know how anyone can get on to these well remunerated part time jobs.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
